Package: io.vertx.ext.mail

[Java] Class MailConfig

    • io.vertx.ext.mail.MailConfig

    • represents the configuration of a mail service with mail server hostname, port, security options, login options and login/password

      Authors:
      Alexander Lehmann

      • Field Summary

          Fields 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static String  DEFAULT_HOST
          static LoginOption  DEFAULT_LOGIN
          static int  DEFAULT_PORT
          static StarttlsOption  DEFAULT_TLS

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          MailConfig ()
          construct a config object with default options
          MailConfig (String hostname)
          construct a config object with hostname and default options
          MailConfig (String hostname, int port)
          construct a config object with hostname/port and default options
          MailConfig (String hostname, int port, StarttlsOption starttls, LoginOption login)
          construct a config object with hostname/port and security and login options
          MailConfig (MailConfig other)
          copy config object from another MailConfig object
          MailConfig (JsonObject config)
          construct config object from Json representation

      • Constructor Detail

        • public MailConfig()

          construct a config object with default options

        • public MailConfig(String hostname)

          construct a config object with hostname and default options

          Parameters:
          hostname - the hostname of the mail server

        • public MailConfig(String hostname, int port)

          construct a config object with hostname/port and default options

          Parameters:
          hostname - the hostname of the mail server
          port - the port of the mail server

        • public MailConfig(String hostname, int port, StarttlsOption starttls, LoginOption login)

          construct a config object with hostname/port and security and login options

          Parameters:
          hostname - the hostname of the mail server
          port - the port of the mail server
          starttls - whether to use TLS or not
          login - whether to use Login or not

        • public MailConfig(MailConfig other)

          copy config object from another MailConfig object

          Parameters:
          other - the object to be copied

        • public MailConfig(JsonObject config)

          construct config object from Json representation

          Parameters:
          config - the config to copy

      • Method Detail

        • @Override public boolean equals(Object o)

        • public String getAuthMethods()

          get string of allowed auth methods, if set only these methods will be used if the server supports them. If null or empty all supported methods may be used

          Returns:
          the authMethods

          get the hostname to be used for HELO/EHLO

          Returns:
          the ehloHostname

        • @Override public int hashCode()

        • public boolean isSsl()

          get whether ssl is used on connect

          Returns:
          ssl option

        • public boolean isTrustAll()

          get whether to trust all certificates on ssl connect

          Returns:
          trustAll option

        • public MailConfig setAuthMethods(String authMethods)

          set string of allowed auth methods

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          authMethods - the authMethods to set

        • public MailConfig setEhloHostname(String ehloHostname)

          set the hostname to be used for HELO/EHLO

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          ehloHostname - the ehloHostname to set

        • public MailConfig setHostname(String hostname)

          Set the hostname of the smtp server.

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          hostname - the hostname (default is localhost)

        • public MailConfig setLogin(LoginOption login)

          Set the login mode for the connection. Either DISABLED, OPTIONAL or REQUIRED

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          login - (default is OPTIONAL)

        • public MailConfig setNetClientOptions(NetClientOptions netClientOptions)

          set the NetClientOptions to be used when opening SMTP connections if not set, an options object will be created based on other settings (ssl and trustAll)

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          netClientOptions - the netClientOptions to set

        • public MailConfig setPassword(String password)

          Set the password for the login.

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          password - the password

        • public MailConfig setPort(int port)

          Set the port of the smtp server.

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          port - the port (default is 25)

        • public MailConfig setSsl(boolean ssl)

          Set the sslOnConnect mode for the connection.

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          ssl - true is ssl is used

        • public MailConfig setStarttls(StarttlsOption starttls)

          Set the tls security mode for the connection. Either NONE, OPTIONAL or REQUIRED

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          starttls - (default is OPTIONAL)

        • public MailConfig setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)

          set whether to trust all certificates on ssl connect the option is also applied to STARTTLS operation

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          trustAll - trust all certificates

        • public MailConfig setUsername(String username)

          Set the username for the login.

          Returns:
          a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
          Parameters:
          username - the username

        • public JsonObject toJson()

          convert config object to Json representation

          Returns:
          json object of the config
